properties.name: selectedStep
properties.description: Enable to select the step by it's index

properties.name: linearMode
properties.description: If this property is true, we can move next steps one by one. Default value is false

properties.name: optionalSteps
properties.description: In linear mode, we can move to optional steps, even it is not increased by linear

properties.name: maxHeight
properties.description: Maximum height of the stepper body, if the height of the body is bigger than this property, slider will be appeared

properties.name: valid
properties.description: When property setup as false, on current step will apply styles for invalid step and will restrict move on to any other step

properties.name: diableForwardHeaderNavigation
properties.description: When property setup as true, forward navigation by click on headers will be disabled from current step

events.name: current:step
events.description: Event is emitted after changing the step with current step index
